it.hackcaffebabe.ioutil.random

Class XRandom

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.hackcaffebabe.ioutil.random.XRandom

  • public final class XRandom
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple library that provide some methods to generate random data for testing purpose.
    This is made possible by Xeger class http://code.google.com/p/xeger/

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String getRandomBinNumber()
      This method returns a random Binary number.
      static java.lang.String getRandomDate(Mode dateMode)
      This method generates a random date in mode given.
      static java.lang.String getRandomEmail()
      This method return a random email in format uuuu.uuuu@dddd.ddd or uuuu.uuuu@dddd.dd
      static java.lang.String getRandomHexNumber()
      This method returns a random Hexadecimal number.
      static java.lang.String getRandomHours()
      This method returns a random hours in format hh:mm:ss

      This method returns a random Integer number in range 1-999999999.

      This method returns a random Integer number in range 1 to maxLength.

      This method returns a random number between minimum and maximum number ( included ).
      static java.lang.String getRandomIPv4()
      This method returns a custom IPv4 as a String.

    • Method Detail

      • getRandomString

        public static java.lang.String getRandomString(int length,
                                               Mode mode)
                                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This method generate a Random String with length and mode given.
        Parameters:
        length - Integer of the String
        mode - Mode of String generation.
        String with all UPPER case, lower case, First Char Upper, BoTh Of ThEm or CamelCase.
        Returns:
        String generated random String.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if argument given are null or length less or equal to 0

      • getRandomIntNumber

        Returns:
        Integer random Integer number.

      • getRandomIntNumber

        public static java.lang.Integer getRandomIntNumber(int min,
                                                   int max)
                                            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This method returns a random number between minimum and maximum number ( included ).
        Parameters:
        min - Integer the minimum number of range.
        max - Integer the maximum number of range.
        Returns:
        Integer random number between minimum and maximum number.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if minimum or maximum are less of zero, or minimum is greater than maximum.

      • getRandomIntNumber

        public static java.lang.Integer getRandomIntNumber(int maxLength)
                                            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This method returns a random Integer number in range 1 to maxLength. Use this method if you want a range less of 1-9.
        Parameters:
        maxLength - Integer of decimal number length.
        Returns:
        Integer random Decimal number with length between 1 to maxLength.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if argument are null or out of range 1 to 9.
